author: Ross Burden
method: For the pork, heat the oil in a pan until very hot and add the pork with the spices and lime juice and fry for 8 minutes until golden and crispy. Stir through the coriander and take off the heat. For the salad, mix together the herbs and drizzle with oil. To serve, place the salad on a plate and sprinkle over the pork.
